availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John F. McMillan (Carlisle, Nicholas Co, Kentucky, physician.)

body.p: Carlisle, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Phoebe A. McMillan. Physician in Nicholas County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1850. Physician in Carlisle in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas, District 2, p. 392B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas, District 2, p. 1.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas, Carlisle, 277.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas, Carlisle, p.137A.
